game.name: Baby Witch Magic Potion
game.description:
Baby Witch Magic Potion is an awesome brand new game full of fun and entertainment for both girls and boys. You will see a very cute baby whose cat has got hurt a little bit. She wants to prepare a magic potion to heal the leg of her lovely pet friend. For this purpose, the little baby needs your help. Are you ready to help her out in to create a potion that could get her precious kitty, Luna, relieved from the unwanted pain? It has a broken paw, so please do it fast to complete the goal of this free online cooking game.

Begin this cool challenging mini game with collecting all the necessary ingredients for the magic potion. This will allow you to learn how to prepare a wonderful secret recipe. Your little help will the girl to take her on a nice ride on her exclusively magical broom. Gather the ingredients and guide the little girl to her flight with the help of the mouse. The task is pretty difficult since the way is full of obstacles, such as rocks or branches. Your witch might get injured if any of the hindrances hit on her head. 

Make her flight smooth with the perfect potions. The more you collect, the longer you will remain in the air. Once you get everything ready, begin this fabulous kitchen game with mixing the needful ingredients that you can find in the big pot: the feather of a phoenix bird, a four leaf clover, mirth and a colourful candy. Add them to the recipe before muddling several herbs like basil, rosemary and mint. Your potion is ready now. Brush it on your pet paw and you will see it will heal miraculously. Also dress up your baby with a nice outfit and celebrate the fun moments together.
